layout.name: spearHeight
layout.title: Spear Height
layout.tooltip: Changes the height of the Dancing Spear Guy's Spear.

layout.name: sequence
layout.title: Dance Sequence
layout.tooltip: A set of numbers will determine what the NPC will do.

layout.name: zero
layout.text:
0: Causes the NPC to jump straight up.
1: Causes the NPC to scurry around on the spot
2:Causes the NPC to hop on one foot (left)
3:Causes the NPC to hop on one foot (right)
4:Causes the NPC to jump to the left
5:Causes the NPC to jump to the right
6:Causes the NPC to twirl in a circle moving left
7:Causes the NPC to twirl in a circle moving right
8:Causes the NPC to wiggle its butt at the camera
